page.title: 15A shop in St.Mary's Street.
page.content: {St.Mary's street}is one of the{main {shopping streets}in town.On this street is a{Shell Shop}which I live above.In the shop are shells and gifts which people buy to give to friends. Part of the shop is where we sell ice- cream for when it is hot in summer.The rest of the shop is mostly shell ornaments,clotted cream toffees,fudge and Parlards Pebbles and Shrimps.The name of the shop is{Shakespeares because it is our surname and it is a famous name.You cannot see the name easily because we have hats and rubber dinghies hung up outside. Saturday is the buisiest day.I sometimes help in tne shop by the till putting things in bags or helping serve the ice-creams. -Amanda Shakespeare.
